CustomField.formula: IF( $User.Full_Name__c = Project_Owner__r.Full_Name__c , 'Yes', IF( $User.Full_Name__c = CreatedBy.Full_Name__c , 'Yes', IF( $User.Full_Name__c = Development_Owner__r.Full_Name__c , 'Yes', IF( $User.Full_Name__c = Owner:User.Full_Name__c , 'Yes', 'No'))))
CustomField.label: My SIR
